CustomField.description: Current supervisor round number for Supervised workflow mode. Incremented each time the supervisor LLM is invoked. Used for observability, storyboard display, and circuit breaker enforcement (MaxSupervisorRounds__c).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Current supervisor iteration round. Increments each time the supervisor LLM runs. Only used in Supervised workflow mode.
CustomField.label: Supervisor Round
